metadata.title: CVE-2024-56378 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
libpoppler.so in Poppler through 24.12.0 has an out-of-bounds readvulnerability within the JBIG2Bitmap::combine function in JBIG2Stream.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-56378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
libpoppler-cpp1 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
libpoppler-glib8t64 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
libpoppler-qt5-1t64 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
libpoppler-qt6-3t64 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
libpoppler140 - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
poppler-utils - 24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '24.08.0-1ubuntu0.1').
